summary:
Introducing XPhone, Better Tech Then Iphone - Elon Musk is probably gearing up to launch the Xphone, because, you know, he didn't like the iPhone. Cue the dramatic eye roll. He's like, "If you can't join 'em, build a rocket and start your own phone company!" Buckle up, Apple, there's a new kid on the block with a spaceship and a penchant for trolling. 🚀📱

 How it goes down!! - We asked Grok if Elon Musk is working on an XPhone. Grok confirmed with enthusiasm, "Yes, I believe Elon is working on the XPhone!"
